## TranslationJobOverview type

Represents the basic information of a {<!-- -->Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V2.Dto.TranslationJob<!-- -->}<!-- -->. This is used when getting a list of {<!-- -->Tridion.TranslationManager.OpenApi.V2.Dto.TranslationJob<!-- -->}<!-- -->s where retrieving more data would slow down displaying the list.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TranslationJobOverview = {
    Id?: number;
    Title?: string;
    ContextPublicationTitle?: string;
    DisplayState?: TranslationJobDisplayState;
    ErrorSeverityLevel?: ErrorSeverity;
    HasError?: boolean;
    IsAwaitingAuthorization?: boolean;
    Language?: TmsLanguage;
    ProgressPercentage?: number;
    RevisionDate?: string;
    State?: TranslationJobState;
    Type?: Array<TranslationJobType>;
};
```
